g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_f62a0c70-4434-4a18-8414-c93aafc1b806
g.text: 168 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))not aidecron.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_7c04f2d2-3257-4a2c-80a6-3b6562bf8f62
g.text: 169 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))not aidecron.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_d42f6a66-aba9-4e47-ac60-a0c89ef64a5f
g.text: 174 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))ansible_os_family == "RedHat" and not rhelaidedb.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_5b1e6b23-e02c-4cbe-bc0e-f619e738ae8a
g.text: 176 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))ansible_os_family == "RedHat" and not rhelaidedbnew.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_8d4ac650-95df-48af-9db2-2dd3d0a4a294
g.text: 177 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))ansible_os_family == "Debian" and not ubuaidedb.stat.exists]
